service.name: Dad and Partner Pay
service.description:
Dad and Partner Pay (DAP) is an income tested and work tested payment to support eligible working fathers or partners (including adopting parents and parents in same-sex relationships) caring for a child born or who entered your care on or after 1 January 2013.
Dad and Partner Pay is a taxable payment paid at the rate of the National Minimum Wage for a maximum of 2 weeks.
